title: Ticket #2991: Build Globus and Voms on Mac OS X 10.7
description:
Older versions of Condor, built on older versions of Mac OS X, included Globus and VOMS. We should continue that support for Condor 7.8 and beyond on Mac OS X 10.7.

The following changes were necessary to build Globus and VOMS on Mac 10.7 in NMI:

  • Mark Mac 10.7 as x86_64 for cmake variable SYS_ARCH.
  • Modify Globus to allow use of bsd tar.
  • Force use of the system's openssl for Globus (instead of alternate versions found via pkg-config).
  • In VOMS, ensure librep has at least one object file. Mac 10.7 doesn't like static libraries with no object files.
